name: Peony Bloom
description: Delicate peony petals blended with floral oils for a relaxing, garden-fresh ambiance.

name: Flower Haven
description: An elegant floral bouquet scent that transforms your space into a peaceful retreat.

name: Green Cactus
description: Fresh and earthy tones of cactus and aloe, ideal for minimal and nature-inspired settings.

name: Lemon Spice
description: A zesty lemon twist paired with warm spices to energize and refresh your mood.

name: Bow Candle Set
description: Charming and romantic, this bow-tied candle set adds a soft, cozy touch to your evenings.

name: Purple Breeze
description: A soothing blend of lavender and violet petals that drifts through the air like a gentle breeze.

name: Lighten Up Sunflower
description: Brighten your space with the cheerful and fresh scent of blooming sunflowers.

name: Coconutty
description: A creamy tropical blend of fresh coconut that brings beachy vibes to your home.

name: Mini Candles Set
description: A lovely set of miniature candles with soft aromas, perfect for intimate moments or gifting.

name: Chocolate Bliss
description: Indulge in the rich, decadent scent of melted chocolate — a true dessert lover’s dream.

name: Chai & Cookies
description: A cozy blend of spiced chai and warm vanilla cookies — perfect for relaxing evenings.

name: Sweet Coffee
description: Wake up your senses with the rich aroma of freshly brewed sweetened coffee.

name: Ice-Cream
description: A cool and creamy fragrance reminiscent of vanilla ice cream on a summer day.

name: Hot Chocolate
description: Rich, indulgent chocolate notes swirled with marshmallow sweetness for a cozy vibe.

name: Coffee Latte
description: Creamy latte aroma with hints of caramel and steamed milk — like your favorite café.

name: Lemon Meringue
description: A zesty lemon scent layered with sweet vanilla meringue for a dessert-inspired treat.

name: Strawberry Cream
description: A sweet and creamy blend of ripe strawberries and whipped vanilla — like dessert in a jar.

name: Pink Rose
description: Elegant pink rose petals blended into a soft, romantic fragrance perfect for calm evenings.

name: Dried Flower
description: A rustic aroma evoking the charm of dried florals and warm afternoons in the countryside.

name: Rose Garden
description: Step into a blooming garden with this rich blend of fresh rose petals and subtle greenery.

name: Red Rose
description: A bold and passionate red rose fragrance that fills your space with timeless elegance.

name: White Rose
description: Delicate and pure, this white rose candle brings a soft floral breeze to any room.

name: Lavender Rose
description: A soothing fusion of lavender and rose that brings calm and floral elegance to your space.

name: Wild Cherry
description: Bursting with the bold and juicy aroma of wild cherries — sweet, tangy, and vibrant.

name: Apple Crisp
description: A warm and comforting scent of baked apples with cinnamon and sugar crust notes.

name: Gold Touched Vanilla
description: A luxurious blend of rich vanilla with golden amber undertones — elegant and warm.

name: Smoothy
description: A velvety mix of soft fruits and vanilla, offering a creamy and gentle fragrance.

name: Bannana Pudding
description: Sweet and nostalgic, this candle smells like creamy banana pudding with a hint of vanilla wafer.

name: Sea Shell
description: Inspired by the ocean breeze, this fresh and airy scent brings seaside serenity to your room.

name: Honey bae
description: A warm and cozy scent of golden honey with soft floral notes — sweet and tender.
